subject: Running
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Peter Kamais of Kenya won the men’s race after Haile Gebrselassie pulled out at Mile 8. Mara Yamauchi of Britain passed Deena Kastor near the end to win the women’s race.
snippet: Peter Kamais of Kenya won the men’s race after Haile Gebrselassie pulled out at Mile 8. Mara Yamauchi of Britain passed Deena Kastor near the end to win the women’s race.
